--- title: Title keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "summary" ---

connector¶

Connectors are pretty damn useful for those of us who love databases.

class LocalLog[source]

LocalLog(logname, log_path)

Creates a local logfile where these classes are imported, showing database connections and what was run on databases.

class StreamLog[source]

StreamLog(logname)

Logs to STDOUT, useful for scripts that query DBs. Every query will print JSON with information about SQL ran.

class DBConnector[source]

DBConnector(config_file, log=<analytics_toolbox.connector.StreamLog object at 0x11151cc18>)

Object that stores connections to many databases, which are created from a .ini file that is passed as an object.

class DatabaseConnection[source]

DatabaseConnection(credentials, log)

Built on psycopg2 connections, provides high level API for running queries and returning necessary information. Implemented as an object on DBConnector.

move_table[source]

move_table(table, from_db, to_db)

current_datetime_dict[source]

current_datetime_dict(current_time=datetime.datetime(2020, 2, 11, 22, 45, 34, 720195))

class NativeTemplateEnvironment[source]

NativeTemplateEnvironment(templates_folder)

Reads files from a folder, passed during initialization, and injects values from a dictionary. Usings Python native string functions.
